alert.note: Alert for Brunswick; Lunenburg; Nottoway (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 26 at 10:20PM EDT until June 27 at 12:00AM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1100 PM EDT FOR NORTHEASTERN LUNENBURG...SOUTHWESTERN NOTTOWAY AND NORTHWESTERN BRUNSWICK COUNTIES... At 1020 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Lunenburg, or near Victoria, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and powerlines. This severe storm will be near... Kenbridge around 1030 PM EDT. Dundas around 1045 PM EDT. Blackstone around 1105 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Lafoon Corner, Danieltown, Irby, Barrows Store, Murdocks, Oral Oaks, Forkland, The Falls and Dominy Corner. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
